benchmark_details.name: LongBench-T2I
benchmark_details.overview: LongBench-T2I is a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate text-to-image models under complex instructions, featuring 500 intricately designed prompts spanning nine visual evaluation dimensions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a holistic benchmark for text-to-image generation under complex instructions and propose an agent framework for effective image generation.

data.source: Generated through a multi-stage pipeline using LLMs and human oversight.
data.annotation: Human-reviewed and generated using Large Language Models (LLMs).

methodology.calculation: Generated images are assessed against nine predefined visual evaluation dimensions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better adherence to complex instructions in image generation.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparison with existing benchmarks like DrawBench and T2I-CompBench.
methodology.validation: Utilization of LLMs for evaluating prompt adherence and visual coherence.
